author: LORI HINNANT and DANICA KIRKA Associated Press
title: Virus puts UK PM in intensive care; hopes rise in US, Europe
description: British Prime Minister Boris Johnson spent the night in intensive care and was receiving oxygen for treatment of his coronavirus illness
content:
LONDON -- 
British Prime Minister Boris Johnson was in intensive care Tuesday fighting the coronavirus, while authorities in New York and elsewhere in Europe hoped that an apparent plateau of deaths and new hospitalizations signaled that key epicenters in th… [+5585 chars]
